resources.string: You want to clear all list of files

You can select files that would be deleted after entering fake password here. In this menu you can choose only files which don\'t require root rights to be deleted.

\n

To add new file or folder, tap button +. 

\n

You can delete file from list, clear list of files or edit file\'s priority. Files with higher priority are deleted first.
Do you want to clear logs?
Logs for day %1$s would be cleared.

"You can read logs here if they are enabled. You can find out when application was unlocked and what files were deleted. Logs are deleting automatically after 7 days, but you can change this behaviour. "
Enter timeout for logs autodeletion (in days)
Logs older than n days would be cleared to free space.
Do you really want to enable logging? If adversary would get access to application password he can get data about deleted files. It is highly recommended to enable logs only for application testing.
Do you want to disable logging?

SyrenaPass is an app for creating duress password that can clear data selected by user when typed. It\'s similar to Wasted app and (for now) this is a companion app for Duress, but it deletes only data previously selected by user instead of wiping phone completely, making data deletion seamless for advisory. To set up this app you need to choose files that should be deleted, then activate files deletion and set up Duress app. Enter following parameters in Duress:

action: com.android.syrenapass.action.TRIGGER

receiver: com.android.syrenapass/.presentation.services.DuressListener

key: password

value: your password from this app

You can also enable logs and test app on some mock data.
Do you want ot enable deletion?

If you enter duress password, selected files would be deleted.

\n

Important: files deletion doesn\'t work in BFU mode. If you enter duress password in BFU mode, files deletion will be launched after phone unlocking. If you set up app to destroy itself, it will destroy itself only when all files will be deleted. That\'s why it\'s recommended to avoid using this mode and delete profile with your secret files instead if you can grant app enough privileges.
Enter your new password. It should not be shorter than 8 characters.

You can set new password or select app theme there. If you enable deletion, all selected files would be deleted if you had entered your duress password.

\n

To create duress password, download app Duress, install it, set up and enter following parameters:

action: com.android.syrenapass.action.TRIGGER

receiver: com.android.syrenapass/.presentation.services.DuressListener

key: password

value: your password from this app
Folder %1$s deleted: %2$s percents of files removed
Folder %1$s is not deleted: %2$s percents of files deleted.
You denied access to files, it may cause some bugs.
The app uses accessibility service to listen for a duress password on the lockscreen and listen for usb connections.

This app requires accessibility service to read your password input and recognise decoy password and to receive usb connection events. Click \"ok\" and go to \"Installed Services>SyrenaPass\" if you want to enable/disable accessibility service.

This application needs admin rights to be able to:

  • Wipe device data
  • Observe wrong password attempts

Press "ok" and then press "Activate" to grant this application admin rights.
Device admin rights are not enough to perform operations.
Device admin action failed for some reason: %1$s
Device owner action failed for some reason: %1$s
Root action failed for some reason: %1$s
Wrong android version, SDK version %1$s or higher required
Select maximum number of wrong password attemps before clearing the data. Default: 10
After completion of all operations app will run TRIM command and tell the drive about all areas of data are no longer being used and therefore can be erased. Requires root rights.
App will wipe all user\'s data or all data on phone if called from main user. For wiping all device data (calling wipe from main user) with admin rights Android 13 or below required.

App will destroy itself after ending of all operations. Requires root rights or Dhizuku permission. 

\n

Important: its recommended to use this option with root privileges. If you use this option with Dhizuku permission, Android system may display notification about app deletion that will make data deletion obvious for adversary. Consider using “clear & hide” option with Dhizuku.

App will start to destroy data when usb device or usb accessory connected. Connecting device to computer in charging only mode will be counted too. You must disable this option if you want to connect any USB device without losing data!
After reaching maximum number of wrong password attempts (default: 5), app will start to destroy your data.
Visit your root manager to revoke root rights for this app
There you can select profiles for deletion or create new ones
All profiles marked for deletion will be deleted after entering of duress password
Do you want to install dhizuku?
You need to install dhizuku app and give it device owner rights
You need superuser rights to be able to manage profiles
Do you want to disable logd service on device boot? Logd will be enabled on device reboot when you will disable this option or delete the app.
Do you want to disable logd service after starting deletion of your data? Logd will be enabled on device reboot.
Multiuser settings are not found on this device.
It seems like your device does not support multiple users. If you have root rights, you can enable multiuser UI in settings tab.

App will clear its data and hide itself after ending of all operations. Requires Dhizuku permission (not root!) and Android 9+.

\n

Important: clearing apps data works almost well, but hiding itself may not work or cause bugs. Test twice before use! If it doesn\'t work, you can try to enter duress password only in BFU mode, revoke app\'s admin rights, make a sacrifice to Satan...
Error occurred while unlocking multiuser UI: %1$s
You can set users limit in this dialog. Creating too much users may overflow your device memory.
You can open users settings now
Device can\'t be booted in safe mode now
